strengths: Destroyers have cargo capacity — can transport infantry and mechs
Flagship prevents enemy Space Cannon attacks — counters Xxcha and PDS networks
Zeal grants bonus votes scaling with player count
A+ first-round expansion: 3 capacity ships, 2 at speed 2, plus 5 infantry
Choose 2 of 3 starting techs (Neural Motivator, Sarween Tools, Plasma Scoring)
weaknesses: Going first in Agenda phase is actually disadvantageous
Leaders are lackluster compared to other factions
Modest home system production (3 production, 3 influence)
tips: Use destroyer capacity for flexible early expansion — they carry infantry unlike other factions
Flagship is your key asset against PDS-heavy factions
Starting tech choice is critical — adapt to your slice and neighbors
Strike Wing Alpha II improves destroyer combat and provides invasion defense
Holo-Lattice lets PDS/Space Docks block enemy movement — eliminates need for border patrols

techPaths.name: Flexible start
techPaths.note: Choose starting tech based on slice; Strike Wing Alpha II and Holo-Lattice are your key faction techs
